outline: Saki has formed a band with her childhood friends and is enjoying what each day brings. She happens upon a poster for an observatory event one day and decides to plan a visit with her bandmates, but...
To fulfill her promise to Mafuyu, Kanade wants to learn more about her. Meanwhile, the group visits a doll exhibit, where Mafuyu has a strange experience.
Tsukasa and the rest of WxS begin preparing a Halloween performance for Phoenix Wonderland's Show Contest. However, Rui starts acting unusual after an incident...

Saki invites Haruka to join the Sports Festival Planning Committee. Together with fellow committee member Emu, they strive to make the Sports Festival a fun and joyful event, but how will it turn out?
Eager to make MORE MORE JUMP! official, Airi and the others waste no time in searching for an agency to join, but...

As Vivid BAD SQUAD takes its first steps, An and Kohane are both fully confident that they have the best partner in one another. However, the two partners quickly find themselves hitting a snag. Will they be able to get through it?!

It's the day of the Kamiyama High School Festival, which had completely slipped Mizuki's mind. Upon An's invitation, Mizuki decides to check it out and makes several interesting encounters, including one with a familiar face. Together, they reminisce on the last time they met...

For their second show for the Show Contest, Tsukasa and the rest of WxS are preparing a Christmas-themed musical! However, a prima donna with a voice powerful enough to shock even Nene stands in their path...! Curtains open for these two songstresses as they each put their pride on the line!
Celebrate the New Year with Miku and the others in SEKAI! Get ready for a special episodic story featuring all group members!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: How to Spend New Year's Eve

outline:
It's almost time for the Miya Girls choir recital. Honami is selected as the coordinator for her class, but it's hard to coordinate when everyone's opinions are split right down the middle!
What is kindness? Stuck between a rock and a hard place, Honami gives her answer...!

The MORE MORE JUMP! livestream kicks off to a great start! Things are going smoothly, until Shizuku's fear becomes a reality. Shizuku must reevaluate her past and present self in order to arrive at her ultimate decision.
Toya has decided to create street music as a member of Vivid BAD SQUAD. But something happens to make him wonder if classical music still has some hold on him, leading to some self-doubt...

Shiho has been scouted by a band that's ready to make its big debut, giving her a lot to think about. Then, Saki invites her on a visit to Phoenix Wonderland.
Meanwhile, Tsukasa and the rest of WxS make their own preparations, eager to host them!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Place Where I Can Smile
A Song to Help You Smile

outline: While Kanade and the others embrace Nightcord at 25:00's rising popularity, Ena's illustration account remains stagnant. Ena then sets her sights on an art competition...

WonderlandsShowtime picks up the pace in preparation for their final Show Contest performance! At the same time, Emu learns that her brothers are working on a huge overhaul of Phoenix Wonderland. She tries to convince them to reconsider, but will she be successful?

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Place I Want to Protect

outline: It's the first Doll Festival since Saki returned to school! In the midst of his enthusiastic preparations, Tsukasa looks back on a bitter childhood memory. He then executes his plan to do something special for Saki, but will it go as he hopes...?!

MORE MORE JUMP! continue their livestreams, but Minori is plagued with unease as she fails to find acceptance from the group's fans. One day, an opportunity arises for a collaboration with a famous former idol turned streamer...

Ichika continues her singing practice with Nene in the hopes of improving as much as possible for Shiho. She decides to try performing on the street in order to gain more confidence, but what unexpected encounter awaits her there...?!
In hopes of pulling Kanade out of her songwriting slump, Mizuki plans a mystery tour for a much-needed change of pace. And so begins Nightcord at 25:00's first ever day trip together...
Ichika and the others learn that Shiho has been scouted by another band. Shiho is finally able to express what she's been feeling, but how will her bandmates respond?

Vivid BAD SQUAD shows signs of growth, inspired by changes in Toya.
One day, they'll be able to reach the heights of that legendary night.
With that thought in his head, Akito learns of the man said to be the closest to surpassing RAD WEEKEND...!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: What I Can Do As Your Partner
What It Means to be a Team

outline: Noticing Mizuki's lackluster attitude following the mystery tour, Ena grows worried. Her apparent concern for her friend doesn't go unnoticed by Airi and Shizuku, who extend an invitation to a picnic to both of them in hopes of lifting their spirits.

As the livestreaming gains momentum, Haruka endeavors to create new content to keep viewers engaged. Balancing daily practice, training, school studies, and idol activities, Haruka devotes herself without a moment's rest, causing Shizuku to worry.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: How to Enjoy a Day Off
I Want Them to Rest But...
The One Thing I Want To Do

outline: Toya suddenly ends up taking on a role as a wedding flash mob extra. But when he arrives at the venue, unexpected circumstances mean that the director is nowhere to be seen. As the possibility of a canceled show grows greater by the second, Toya meets Rui...

Phoenix Wonderland is faced with a transformation at the hands of Emu's brothers to appeal to the young adult crowd. In order to make sure it stays a place that makes everyone smile, WonderlandsShowtime prepares a new show.
In time, the curtain rises on a show unlike any other!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Most Important Thing Right Now

outline: Despite Kanade's persistent efforts to save Mafuyu, none of the songs she composes seem to leave an impression on her. Feeling like she's reached a dead end, Kanade heads to SEKAI for advice...

Leo/need has decided to try and go pro, and is practicing with more effort than ever. To make their own song to perform at shows, they decide to each come up with different parts to compare. Wanting to be of help to the band, Saki works harder than anyone else on her contribution, but...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: What I Need to Tell You

outline: Kohane has steadily built up experience, including performing solo at events. An, Akito and Toya all acknowledge her efforts, but Kohane herself doesn't seem confident. An and the others try to get Kohane to believe in herself.

Akito and Toya are invited to perform at the Summer Festival's live concert as a substitute act. Back when Akito had lost sight of his goals after facing setbacks in soccer, he and Ena witnessed that very same event...

The Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy first years arrive at the Seaside School. Finding themselves allocated to the same group for the school's annual presentation event, Honami, Saki, Emu, and Kohane put their showmanship skills to the test by performing a song from a musical.

MORE MORE JUMP! are delighted to receive a request to perform at an elementary school. With experience performing in children's variety shows under her belt, Airi enthusiastically starts planning for the event.

WonderlandsShowtime has begun working as ambassadors for Phoenix Wonderland.
Their first visit will be to an outdoor stage on a beach. Hearing this, Nene remembers the performance of "The Little Mermaid" that she saw when she was little...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: What We Can Do For Now

outline: With MORE MORE JUMP!'s next stream approaching, Shizuku starts thinking of autumn-themed ideas, triggering childhood memories of when she went moon viewing with Shiho. She invites her sister to go together once again...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Moon We Saw Back Then

outline: Bit by bit, the members of Leo/need continue preparations for their first show together. Their new song is coming along well, and all that's left is for Ichika to add her lyrics. She's determined to express the feelings that Saki put into the composition, but will it be so easy...?
Ever since one of Kanade's songs made Mafuyu smile, Mafuyu has wondered why. As the group searches for the answer together, her health suddenly takes a turn for the worse.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Because I Want You To Smile

outline: Minori, Ichika, Kohane and Nene are all set to sing in the annual VIRTUAL SINGER Fan Festival. Kanade and the rest of N25 also attend, keen to witness their favorite creators. The curtains rise, uniting heartfelt emotions into a grand symphony!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Just Go With It And Dance!

outline:
Kohane has gained confidence and shown everyone a glimmer of her true potential. As happy as An is, she can't shake a growing feeling of unease.
Meanwhile, the mysterious man who gave Kohane advice before makes an appearance before the group...

With the song that made Mafuyu smile complete, positive responses from fans come flooding in. Meanwhile, Mizuki feels like the only one unable to get closer to the other members. One day, the group bumps into An, who has seen a side to Mizuki that the others haven't...

Leo/need has begun performing in earnest at the live house. Honami comes up with a schedule to ensure that they can all work on their performance without overexerting themselves, but then she notices that Shiho seems different from usual...

Upon hearing Minori's eagerness to ask An what it was like growing up with Haruka, Kohane suggests a day out for the four of them. On the day of, both Minori and Kohane learn the true depth of An and Haruka's friendship...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: To Stand Proud Next To Them
What I Can't Say But Want To Tell

outline: Ichika has her eye on the last copy of a CD by an artist who creates Miku songs, but so does a fellow shoppera girl with long hair. Surprisingly, the girl allows Ichika to take it. Putting the pieces together, Mafuyu realizes the girl in question was Kanade...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: In The Face Of The Last One
Thoughts That Go Into A Song

outline: Following the success of the elementary school event, the girls start planning for another show in real life, but encounter various obstacles along the way. Just when things seem difficult, they receive an email from a fan offering to help. Minori is thrilled, but...

Kohane and the rest of VBS continue practicing in pursuit of greater growth. However, Toya finds himself struggling to understand the vision that his teammates have for a song due to his lack of life experience. That's when Luka offers some advice!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: I Can Do It Because I'm Me

outline: When Haruka stops by the shrine along her usual running route, she sees the shrine maiden who was there for her in her time of need collapse. In order to repay her for her kindness, Haruka decides to help out at the shrine in her stead.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Let's Do A New Year's Show!

outline: Emu takes part in a discussion with her brothers regarding future operations of the park. However, each idea she puts forth comes up against issues of feasibility, leaving her determined to educate herself. That's when she gets the news of an opportunity to visit Mr. Riley's park...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Let's Go To The Dream Park!
Get A Lost Girl To Smile!

outline: Realizing that quite some time has passed since she first met Mafuyu, Kanade starts a conversation about it on Nightcord. As the others pry deeper into the story, Kanade recounts the beginnings of Nightcord at 25:00.

With Valentine's Day just on the horizon, Airi is planning a surprise for everyone to show them her gratitude. She happens to meet Saki and Emu, who both had similar ideas, and they form a Secret Valentine's Day Alliance.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Because I Want You To Be Happy

outline: Thanks to their experience of going camping together, VBS has learned the importance of having a shared vision when they sing. Kohane asks Taiga if there's a way for them to establish a shared vision of RAD WEEKEND without any footage of the event to go off of.

Shiho feels a great sense of fulfillment after Leo/need successfully reaches its ticket quota and performs in perfect sync for the audience. She recalls the time she spent on her own back in junior high.

Not long before White Day, Tsukasa is set to perform as an extra at a facility where visitors can make their own chocolates. Meanwhile, Mizuki has come up with plans for White Day return gifts, and invites Akito along for some chocolate making.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Gentleman Thief and the Chocolate Fairy!

outline: Having held their real-life event, Shizuku and the others feel that their bond with their fans has grown even stronger. While exploring ideas with their fans, one of them suggests making MORE MORE JUMP! stage outfits as their next endeavor!
As N25's music evolves, Ena struggles to capture the true essence of their songs in her art. In the interest of keeping up with the group, she considers going back to her old art class...

In the Empty SEKAI, Miku's words inspire a discussion among Kanade and the others about having a cherry blossom viewing party. Meanwhile, everyone in the other SEKAI is also planning ways to make the most of the season...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Let's Go See Some Cherry Blossoms
The Pink-Colored Girl in the Classroom
For A Show Filled with Cherry Blossoms

outline: Ever since his visit to Riley Dream Park, Tsukasa has felt a desire to improve even more as an actor. In the troupe's new ambassadorial show, he takes on a character unlike any he has before, with a personality entirely opposite his own.
The wind is in Leo/need's sails as the band continues performing and starts to build its own fanbase. But then, they encounter a brother and sister, who are Leo/need fans, having an argument.
With their new outfits completed, MORE MORE JUMP! next gets someone to help create an original song for their next show. The composer gets to work, but then faces some troubles...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: An Offer For a New Song?
Pleased to Meet You, Ms. Songwriter!
A Song That Can Spread Hope

outline: With the Sports Festival just around the corner, Kamiyama High School is abuzz with talk of the renowned cheering competition, which also piques Rui's interest. Suddenly, Mizuki approaches him with a request...

As Akito repeatedly watches the video of RAD WEEKEND, he realizes that creating a certain "atmosphere" may be the key to surpassing the legend. Then, he hears that Len and the others are going to put on an event in SEKAI.

A photographer who is a regular at the cafe asks An if she would be her bridal model. An, who cares deeply about those around her, pushes past her embarrassment and accepts. At the wedding venue, An encounters another bridal modelShizuku.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Be The Bride You Want To Be

outline: With university practice exams looming, Mafuyu continues to study to meet her mother's expectations. Meanwhile, Mizuki suggests a trip to an amusement park for N25.

After a very successful performance at the music hall, WonderlandsShowtime gets to take a cruiser to their next ambassadorial show venue. But what are they going to do when they all wake up on a desert island after running into a storm...?!

Kanade's fatigue has been catching up to her as of late. Worried that it might affect her compositions, she decides to put effort into building her stamina alongside Ena. They hear that a new sports facility called SpoJoy Park just opened near the station...

After successfully hosting their own event for the first time, Vivid BAD SQUAD is determined to ride that wave closer to the heights of RAD WEEKEND. As they're discussing that legendary event, the members start to want to know more about Nagi, the woman who played a central role.
Leo/need has decided to perform at a new live house to take the next step in their journey. Saki writes a new song to play at the show, but it doesn't seem to resonate with the audience at all...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Until I Get These Feelings Out

outline: Nene finds out there will be a gaming tournament taking place at an arcade, and decides to participate in hopes of winning the grand prize. But just around the same time, Toya is also thinking about participating...

Feeling the need for further practice leading up to their solo show, MORE MORE JUMP! decide to do a training camp that doubles as a streaming project. They start doing a variety of exercises under a special program devised by Airi, but something seems to be worrying Minori...
Noticing how Mafuyu feels more at home surrounded by N25 puts a smile on Mizuki's face. Realizing how they're both alike in that sense, Mizuki recalls their former self before joining N25.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Gift From My Big Sis
The Art That Tied Us Together
Brushing At The Depths Of Pain
The Path I Want To Walk

outline: Now that Shiho has passionately declared that they'll let their music do the talking, she and the rest of Leo/need decide to ramp up their practice in the month leading up to their next show. When that proves to be insufficient, Shiho proposes an intense training program in SEKAI!

Ena decides to go back to her former art class, but her teacher, Mr. Yukihira, tells her that her drawing lacks appeal. Meanwhile, Honami feels anxious about job shadowing, tasked with teaching a subject she struggles with...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: For Me To Draw It Right
To Draw It The Way I Want

outline: In preparation for their next event, Vivid BAD SQUAD, Arata and the others set out to write different songs based on a single theme. Akito and An take on the duty of making the new track, but Toya wishes that he could contribute to lighten their load.
Mafuyu continues to study for her medical school entrance exams while developing some angst towards her mother. However, she ends up volunteering for a big festival called Shibuya Festa and...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Flyer Full Of Our Thoughts
The Other Side Of The Festival

outline: The time has finally arrived for the first solo show of MORE MORE JUMP! Minori still can't seem to shake her nerves, but is reminded of the time she saw an ASRUN show for the first time after Haruka tells Minori a story about her own past...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Start Of Our Solo Show
What This Stage Means To Us

outline: The next ambassadorial performance is going to be the last one?! WonderlandsShowtime is staggered to hear the news, but is followed by an offer to do a joint performance with a highly regarded theme park that puts on the best shows in Japan. As chaotic practices ensue, Rui is approached by a certain person...

The Miya Girls School Festival is fast approaching. Kohane was thinking about inviting the rest of Vivid BAD SQUAD and wondering what they could do throughout the day, but her class, 1-A, decided to do something An's not very fond of... A haunted house!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Our Idea For The School Festival
The Miya Girls School Festival Starts Now!
If We Start Now, Maybe We Can
Into The Slightly Dark Woods With Everyone

outline: After putting on a successful show, Leo/need decides to start posting videos to a video platform so that their music can reach more people. Meanwhile, Ichika tries to help out the band by creating songs using digital tools, but is still struggling...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Singing Voice That Rocks The World
The Sound I Want Them To Hear

outline: While wondering what to do about the theme she was assigned during art class, Ena happens to come across Mafuyu sitting by herself on the side of a walkway. Ena decides to talk to her since it's raining and there's no sign of her moving...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Light I Saw Next To Me

outline: After putting on a successful solo show, MORE MORE JUMP! starts thinking about their next goal. During that time, they're offered a chance to appear on TV. Everyone is excited to hear the news, except Haruka, who doesn't quite share in their optimism...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Fan Letter Full Of Thoughts
For The Ones Who Haven't Seen Yet

outline: Tis the season to be jolly and Vivid BAD SQUAD is all gathered at Weekend Garage. They discuss performing at the live house where RADder debuted, but Akito seems to have some history with said venue...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Someday, Even If It's Not Soon

outline: One day at the archery club, by a strange coincidence, Shizuku senses something hidden beneath Mafuyu's smile. It reminds her of the time when they met for the first time and...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: At The Archery Range In Winter
As Much As I Want To Help
For Now, Focus On This Shot
Snow That Feels A Little Warm

outline: After successfully wrapping up their ambassadorial performances, WonderlandsShowtime is preparing to put on a New Year's show at the new and improved Wonder Stage. Unfortunately, Lion Dance Robot seems to be feeling a bit under the weather...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A New Year's Show With Everyone
Idols Have To See The First Sunrise?!
A Place To Relax And A Night Melody

outline: Following their New Year's performance, everyone from WonderlandsShowtime returns to their daily lives. During this time, Emu hears that Tsukasa's going to enroll in a workshop and is happy to hear that he's taking a step towards making his dream come true, but...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: I Want To See Them Shine

outline: Leo/need continues to get their name out there as more people begin watching their videos and coming to see their shows. Then, someone from a record company appears before them and suggests that they put on their very own solo show...!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Hurdle Called A Solo Show
From Someone Who's Done This Before

outline: Ichika and Nene aren't sure what to give for Valentine's Day. They ask Honami for some advice and decide to make some scented candles together. Meanwhile, Kanade, who has the same concern, also asks Honami for help...

MORE MORE JUMP! is all set for their first TV appearance. However, the show's MC just happens to be the leader of the very group Shizuku used to be in, Cheerful * Days. As excited as she was about making their shoot a success, this surprise reunion has Shizuku...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Courage To Face The Past
I Just Want To Be Myself

outline: Vivid BAD SQUAD is all set to perform at "Crawl Green" and are very excited about it. Kohane and the others are also looking forward to seeing Taiga there, but he happens to get a phone call which...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Date While Wearing Our Uniforms

outline: Tsukasa and Saki invite Toya over for a party. With White Day approaching, he wants to give something back to the two of them. He tries his hand at baking from scratch, with varying results...

At the Otoris' suggestion, Tsukasa and the rest of WxS are set to perform in the Phoenix Stage's 30th Anniversary Show. What's more, they'll be performing a show starred in by Tsukasa's idol. Tsukasa leaps at the chance to audition for the same role as him!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Star I Look Up To

outline: Watched closely by her mother, Mafuyu's interaction with N25 continues to be limited. Focusing on what she can still do for her friend, Kanade is driven to keep composing, until she receives a mysterious message...

With days to go before Leo/need's solo show, Shiho is on Vivid Street for an errand. When a powerful voice coming from an alley blows her away, she follows the sound to find An alone, singing intensely.
After their first solo show, Leo/need get advice about professionalism from anemone's Saku and STANDOUT's Iori. But something they say doesn't sit quite right with Saki...

In the wake of iHaz, MORE MORE JUMP! are inundated with work offers. After taking a fresh look at their schedule, Airi and the rest of MMJ consider adopting a work style that makes use of the credit-based course.
With Mafuyu's contact with the group restricted, the rest of N25 think what they can do for her. Hoping to give her some peace of mind, Mizuki comes up with a plan...

The Miya Girls first years are headed to Yokohama! Haruka realizes this field trip might be her last memory with her general education class before returning to the credit-based course. Saki asks to be in her group for the trip.
As the 30th Anniversary Show approaches, Nene is hard at work preparing for her role as the Cowardly Canary. However, during a rehearsal, the director criticizes not her acting, but her singing...

Honami notices that Kanade has been more focused than ever on composing lately. When Emu gives her tickets to a bridal fair, Honami decides to invite Kanade in the hope of her employer taking a break.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: What You Can, With All You Have

outline: Vivid BAD SQUAD's explosive third event has roused expectations that the team might actually surpass RAD WEEKEND. That's when Taiga summons them for "an important conversation"...
Minori has told her groupmates in MORE MORE JUMP! that she wants to switch to the credit-based course. This hasn't been an easy decision to make, but she's been supported by some special people.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: If I Focus On Idol Work

outline: Kamiyama High School's second-years are headed to Kyoto! In contrast with Tsukasa's excitement for their school trip, Rui is less enthused. But will his feelings change when one of his classmates approaches him?

As if losing her computer wasn't bad enough, Mafuyu feels her mother's grip tighten on her life, taking an increasing toll on her mental state. Amid all this, her teacher is due to return the results of a final...

Leo/need has done it at last. They've been signed by a record label! Reflecting on all of the people whose support has taken them this far, Ichika thinks of a way for the band to show their gratitude.
MORE MORE JUMP!'s latest gig is a TV segment on location at a popular cafe! Little do they realize, it's none other than the cafe where Minori works!

After learning the truth behind RAD WEEKEND, Vivid BAD SQUAD are more determined than ever to surpass that legendary night. The group decide to do what they can for the time being, but Kohane's thoughts linger on her former mentor Taiga.

Following the successful 30th Anniversary Show, the WonderlandsShowtime cast feel renewed determination for their respective dreams. Emu, realizing that the troupe will part ways sooner or later, attempts to put on a brave face and say goodbye with a smile. Meanwhile, Rui makes a bold proposition to the Otori brothers.

The VIRTUAL SINGERS of each SEKAI see how everyone is progressing toward their goals. They are excitedly preparing ways to demonstrate their support for everyone, when something extraordinary happens.

As the Miyamasuzaka Girls Academy school year draws to a close, Saki revisits her "100 Things I Want To Do" list. She makes up her mind to cross off the whole list, especially No. 95: "Make lots of fun memories and put them in a photo album!"

The end of the year is approaching at Kamiyama High School. An is headed to practice as usual when a teacher stops her and Mizuki in their tracks. That's when the pair are confronted with some hair-raising news about their prospects for the next school year.

It's the start of a new school year and everyone has gone up a grade! That fact hasn't quite hit Ichika yet, but when Miku asks to see the opening ceremony, it spurs her to treat it like a special day.

Vivid BAD SQUAD and Ken burn the candle at both ends figuring out how they'll surpass RAD WEEKEND. Tasked with reigniting fervor in the residents of Vivid Street, Akito tries to burn brighter than ever before, but will it go up in smoke?
Leo/need are gearing up to make their professional debut. As their label considers how best to market the band, Mr. Shindo asks the girls what music they aspire to.

With so much on their plate, it's getting harder for MORE MORE JUMP! to keep on top of their schedule. Shizuku suggests that Saito become the group's manager since she's proven her talents to them, but things are not so simple...

Mafuyu is now living with Kanade after running away, and all four members of Nightcord at 25:00 are working together again. As they each turn their thoughts to the future, something begins to shift in the Empty SEKAI...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: I Want To, But I Can't

outline: WonderlandsShowtime have decided to work with other troupes, starting with the long-established Shunmeiza. Given a minor role with just three lines, Tsukasa faces a seemingly impossible task: to convince the director that his character is a real person.
When Kamiyama High School's very first Arts Festival is announced, Class 2-A decides to produce a film! It falls to Nene to sit in the director's chair, but will her leadership cut it?

Fresh second-years Minori and Shiho are on the animal caretaker committee, and their work has already begun. When they learn about a shadowing opportunity at Odaiba Animal Land from a teacher, they decide to participate. Animal antics ensue!
Kanade continues to write songs in the hope of saving Mafuyu. When her grandmother calls to suggest that she think more about herself and her own future, her thoughts turn toward the past.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Way I Played That Day

outline: One day in December, Mizuki's sister sends word from abroad that she'll be coming to visit, to Mizuki's delight. Warm memories resurface, of a time long ago when the two of them went shopping together. And so, Mizuki extends an invitation to go once again.
Vivid BAD SQUAD continue their intensive training, set on surpassing RAD WEEKEND. But one day in the Street SEKAI, a new area suddenly appears: an unfamiliar plaza, in which stands a huge wall...

WonderlandsShowtime's next step is to appear as extras in a film! Each of them is enthusiastic about this opportunity to work their magic on camera, and Rui is particularly eager to learn about a different type of directing. However, not everything goes smoothly...

For Valentine's Day, Kohane hopes to buy An the chocolates she wants to try, but unfortunately, they're all sold out. Then, she learns that those chocolates are one of the prizes for a Valentine's Day photo contest being held by a makeup brand!

Honami considers Mr. Shindo's question of what kind of music she aspires to, but finds herself feeling restless as she's unable to find an answer. Meanwhile, Mr. Shindo discusses Leo/need with the president of Solis Records.
MORE MORE JUMP! starts looking at candidates for their new home base, the MORE MORE HOUSE. However, finding a place that fits their criteria proves rather difficult...

In the lead-up to White Day, Kanade begins thinking about how to express her gratitude for the Valentine's chocolate she received, as well as for all the help she's been given. As she's struggling to think of gifts, she learns that Ichika is having the same dilemma, and the two team up!
WonderlandsShowtime's training continues as they each pursue their dreams. When they're called over to SEKAI by Rin and the others one day, they find an expansive new land awaiting them!

eventStoryEpisodes.title: Who Do You Want To Be?
As Many Times As It Takes

outline: The members of Vivid BAD SQUAD each contend with the missions Ken has assigned them, with their sights on the day they surpass RAD WEEKEND. Toya's task is to write every track they're going to use for their event, and he attempts to pour everything into a song, but that's easier said than done...

On one of his daily runs, Akito has an encounter with a dog and his owner. The pair has been training day by day in the hopes of one day winning a national disc dog competition. But the day before their next competition, this dog owner sprains his ankle...

Ena debates whether she should aim for art school post-graduation. With this inner turmoil comes restlessness, which begins to affect her art. Mr. Yukihira notices that she's struggling, and after she divulges the cause, he invites her to take part in an excursion.

Leo/need is finally going to start writing its debut song! However, Mr. Shindo has a request: that Saki and Ichika compose it together. The pair are determined to make it a great song, but things don't go so smoothly...

An psyches herself up to work on the task she's been given, but there's hesitation in her singing. When she realizes that her unease over Kohane is causing the problem, An calls her out to Vivid Street to settle things once and for all.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: I Can't Put It Into Words

outline: On MORE MORE JUMP!'s first free day in quite some time, they have been enjoying school life to the full. Their recent TV appearance has caused a buzz among their classmates, renewing their determination to keep working their hardest. That's when they each find themselves in an unfamiliar part of SEKAI...!
WonderlandsShowtime has finished training with Shunmeiza, and is set to study stage combat with the Mikazukigumi troupe. How will Emu and the others fare on this new, intensely physical stage?!
Minori has started doing solo walking-tour streams as part of MORE MORE JUMP!'s activities. One day, she follows a viewer's recommendation to check out the Phoenix Bridal Fair!
With more work offers coming in for MORE MORE JUMP! than they can fulfill, Haruka and the others have a serious talk about their work priorities moving forward.

Mafuyu has been stuck unable to move forward since coming to stay with Kanade. Her father asks her what happened that day she spoke with her mother, but though she tries, Mafuyu finds herself unable to answer.

The time to surpass RAD WEEKEND has come at last. Kohane is nervous about the task ahead, but musters up her resolve as she looks back on everything she's overcome to get this far. Will Vivid BAD SQUAD finally do it?!

At Kijima's suggestion, Tsukasa has been putting on muscle to increase his acting chops. He and the others arrive at the Jidaigeki Studio Park with the Mikazukigumi troupe, but news of a theft puts the new production on hold...and that's when Tsukasa spots a suspicious ninja on the lot!
The VIRTUAL SINGER version of Leo/need's debut song is generating buzz, and Ichika and the others couldn't be happier. As the band renews their vow to make it as pros, a new area appears in SEKAI!
MORE MORE JUMP! receives an offer to appear at Idol Lovers Festival, the big break for many young idol groups. During rehearsals, Airi is shocked by the performance of another group...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The View I Wanted to See

outline: Having surpassed RAD WEEKEND, life has been quiet for Toya. Just when he feels like trying something new, the owner of an instrument store who he owes a lot to asks him to deal with customers at an event!
From their space between worlds, Miku and the others watch over everyone. Just then, a fragment appears before them. It takes them to see everyone at the moment their true feelings were born.

Class representatives Emu and Mafuyu are assigned to run a voluntary weeding activity. But no one's signing up to pull weeds in the blazing summer heat! Emu thinks of a way to make it fun for the participants.

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Happy Smiley Test of Courage

outline: Haruka thinks of ways to make exercise fun for MORE MORE JUMP!'s fans. By chance, she meets Tsukasa, who invites her to the athletic event Shinobi Battle!

Leo/need's debut single is taking off. Thanks to the impact of their VIRTUAL SINGER version, their label expresses hopes that the band will create VIRTUAL SINGER versions of all future songs. But Ichika seems hesitant...

The schools of Shibuya are holding the Shibuya City High Schools Joint Festival, a place for students to put on performances. Nene takes on the task of putting on a musical with students from other schools.
Mafuyu's big step forward in her own life inspires another member of N25. Before the School Festival, Mizuki resolves to open up to Ena...
Having surpassed RAD WEEKEND, Vivid BAD SQUAD's next goal is to stand on top of the world. As each member strives to better themselves, something seems to be eating at Akito...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: A Song to Shake the Heart

outline: With their new song released, Leo/need looks forward to Jam Fest. Saki, nervous before her first festival, encounters a familiar face...
After the success at Jam Fest, Shiho is energized to practice. But Shizuku and Saki invite her on a day trip to relax and enjoy the fall foliage.

Nene and her friends have made it to their final training destination, the Morinomiya Revue. While Nene goes into the experience excited to further grow as an actress, the boys' separate training and Emu's focus on business studies leave her attending practices on her own...
Ena hasn't been able to reach Mizuki since the school festival. She doesn't know what the right thing to do is, but her regrets compel her to seek Mizuki out for a heart-to-heart.
MORE MORE JUMP! haven't received any job offers in a while, but one day, an email arrives for Shizuku. It invites her to audition for popular cosmetics brand Grand Fleur's new commercial...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The Resolve to Stay on Top

outline: Rui has received a request to write and direct a ski resort's Christmas show. This is the first script he's penned in some time, and it's apparently based on a Christmas episode from his own childhood...
The US trip is coming up fast, and Akito's been practicing at full throttle. He takes a well-earned break on New Year's Day, but while he's out and about, he ends up running into a certain someone...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: The End of New Year's Day

outline: Vivid BAD SQUAD are just about ready to visit the US, where they'll attend the event Taiga and Ken are taking part in. An excited Toya is packing his things when he receives an unexpected message...

eventStoryEpisodes.title: We All Want the Same Thing

outline: On her way to replace her torn jacket at the mall, Kanade has an encounter with Saki that leads to them setting up a teatime chat. That's when Saki asks her to be the model for her fashion project, of all things...!

Shizuku feels grateful for all of Mafuyu's help with studying and club activities, and wants to do something in return. When she learns that Mafuyu is looking for ways to improve her home ec project, she offers some embroidery lessons.
